name: Talk Bordeaux
_source: s;Anuki;Quiet, Bordeaux. Just shut up.{w}{br}Just one more round.{w}{br}Or are you just tired, old man?
s;Bordeaux;Ha! I barely broke a sweat against you.{w}{br}But I've spent enough years trying to teach you discipline.
s;Bordeaux;You haven't the brain to kill me.|Good night, Lady Anuki.
